text: 20:13 Rom 2:6; 1 Pita 1:17; Akar Mogomem 2:23; 6:8; 20:12; 22:12Ezɨ ongarimɨn ariaghirezir gumazamiziba, ongarim me amadazɨ me izi. Ezɨ Ovevem ko Gumazamizir Oveaghuezibar Nguibam, aning ua ovengezir gumazamizir aningɨn itiba amadazɨ me izi. Ezɨ gumazir atrivir dabirabim gaperaghav itim, gumazamiziba amizir araziba bagha vaghvagha men kotiaba baragha me tuisɨsi.
